product_name: WrightSock CoolMesh II Quarter Socks - 2 Pairs
long_description: With 2 pairs of WrightSock CoolMesh II Quarter socks, you'll get double the performance of the 2-layer design that maximizes moisture management and minimizes friction. Inner layer is made of smooth, undyed, hydrophobic Dri-WRIGHT II(TM) polyester, nylon and Lycra(R) spandex to maximize moisture wicking for cool, dry feet. Outer layer of Dri-WRIGHT II polyester, nylon and Lycra spandex and mesh weave enhances moisture control and airflow. Interaction between inner and outer layers absorbs friction and shearing forces to prevent blisters. Mesh panel across the top of the foot allows maximum wicking action; arch braces support feet. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9. Please note: a package of 2 pairs counts as 1 pair of socks for the 10% volume discount.
short_description: With 2 pairs of WrightSock CoolMesh II Quarter socks, you'll get double the performance of the 2-layer design that maximizes moisture management and minimizes friction.
